verse: 2:1 Naye kino nnakimalirira mu mwoyo gwange, obutajja nate n a nnaku gye muli.
2 Kubanga nze bwe mbanakuwaza, kale ansanyusa ye ani wabula oyo nze gwe nnakuwaza?
3 N'ekyo nnakiwandiika bwe ndijja abo baleme okunnakuwaza abagwanira okunsanyusa; kubanga nneesigammwe mwenna, ng'essaayu lyange lye lyammwe mwenna,
4 Kubangamu kubonaabona okungi n'okulumwa omutima nnabawandiikira n'amaziga amangi, si lwa ku banakuwaza, naye mutegeere okwagala kwe n nina eri mmwe bwe kuli okungi enyo:
5 Naye omuntu bw'aba annakuwazizza, abatanakuwazizza nze, wabula mmwe mwenna, so si mwenn a, nneme okuzitowa ennyo:
6 Kunaamumala ali bw'atyo okubonerezebwa okwo okw'abangi;
7 kyekivudde kibagwanira mmwe okumusonyiwa obusonyiyi n'okumusanyusa, afaanana bw'atyo mpozzi aleme okumirwa en aaku ze nga ziyinze obungi.
8 Kyenva mbeegayirira okunyweza okwagala eri oyo.
9 Kubanga era kyennava mpandiika; ndyoke ntegeere okukemebwa kwammwe, oba nga muwulira mu bigambo byonna.
10 Naye gwe musonyiwa ekigambo, nange mmusonyiwa: kubanga nange kye asonyiye, oba nga nsonyiye, nkisonyiye ku lwammwe mu maaso ga Kristo;
11 Setaani alemenga kutwekulumbalizaako: kubanga tetuli ng'abatategeera nkwe ze.
12 Naye bwe nnajja mu Tulowa olw'enjiri ya Kristo, era oluggi bwe lwanzigulirwawo mu Mukama waffe,
13 ssaalaba kuwummula mu mwoyo gwange, olw'obutasanga Tito muganda wange: naye ne mbasiibula ne ŋŋenda mu Makedoni:
14 Naye Katonda yeebazibwe, atutwalabulijjo ng'abawangulwa mu Kristo, n'atubikkuza evvumbe ery'okumutegeera ye mu buli kifo,
15 Kubanga tuli vvumbe ddungi erya Kristo eri Katonda mu abo abalokoka ne mu bo ababula;
16 eri abo ababula a tuli vvumbe eriva mu kufa erireeta okufa; naye eri bali tuli vvumbe eriva mu bulamu erireeta obulamu. Era ebyo ani abiyinza?
17 Kubanga tetuli nga bali abasinga obungi, abatabanguzi ofwamambo kya Katonda: mu maaso naye olwa Katonda, mu ga Katonda bwe tutyo bwe twogera mu Kristo.
